Isor Pora Abram Logote Niom Banaise
Isor pora Jakob ke Asis Dise
Isor pora Joseph aru tae laga Ghor-manukhan ke Bachaise
Isor Pora Israel Logote Niom Bonaise
Isor Pora David Logote Niom Banaise
Saitan pora Jisu ke Porikha Kurise
Jisu Isor Laga Kam Suru Kurise
Ekta Bhal Samaria Manu Laga Kahani
Maph Dibole Napara Noukar Laga Kahani
Panch Hazar Manu ke Jisu Pora Khabole Dise
Jisu Bia-Atma Thaka Manu aru Bimar Maiki ke changa Kurise
Jisu Ukilkhan Laga Age-te Pariksa Paise
Peter Aru John Ekta Lengra Manu ke Bhal kurise
Paul aru Silas Philippi te Jaise
Jisu He Kosom Dia Jonom Hua Masiha Ase
